data.actual_result: Tooltips appear and get stuck until you hover over the option that produced the tooltip after exiting the Settings page you were in
data.expected_result: Tooltips should either vanish instantly or not appear at all when in the process of entering a Settings page
data.short_description: Option tooltips get stuck if you hover over the options as you're entering a Settings page (Server Settings, Channel Settings, User Settings) I find Server Settings > Integrations > Connect > Closing the Connections page and hovering over where the options are the easiest way of reproducing this
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a settings page and hover over where the options would be right as it is transitioning into the page
